ValidationRule.description: US-0011165 - [NA Deals] New Validation rule to change Maximum Purchases quantity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Deal_V2", ISCHANGED(EBH_MaximumPurchases__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c,"Sent to Seller"), ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c,"Seller Approved"), ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c,"Running"), ISPICKVAL(EBH_Status__c,"Completed") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Insufficient Privileges to change Maximum Purchases at this stage. Please create a new Deal
